Reference

All functions

close_multiprocess()

Close cores

cost_distances()

Estimate isotropic cost distances

distancefile()

Get a table or matrix with the distances between pairs of nodes.

Estimation of connectivity indexes from CONEFOR

euclidean_distances()

Euclidian distances

EXTraster()

Function to have two raster with the same number of rows, columns and extension

List of vegetation patches

Make grid

MK_BCentrality()

MK_Connect_grid()

Connectivity indexes in a regular grid

MK_dECA()

ECA, dA and dECA.

MK_dECA_grid()

dA and dECA in a regular grid

MK_dPCIIC()

Estimate the integral index of connectivity (IIC) or the probability of connectivity (PC)

Fragmentation Statistics

MK_ProtConn()

MK_ProtConnMult()

Estimate centrality measures.

nodesfile()

num_vert()

Number of vertices

over_poly()

over sf

PIntercsect()

intersect polygons

pol_dissolve()
